item.title: Bally's Corp 10-K
item.description: Bally’s Corp, which is in the Hotels & Motels [7011] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 01, 2022 had 46114 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 600 instances 2021 - 502 instances bally - 472 instances million - 400 instances december - 358 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
